actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To establish certain procedures regarding the appointment and tenure of persons to the International St. Lawrence River Board of Control established by the International Joint Commission under the Boundary Waters Treaty of 1909.

summary.text: Sets forth certain procedures regarding the term and appointment of persons to the U.S. section of the International St. Lawrence River Board of Control established by the International Joint Commission under the Order of Approval for Regulation of Lake Ontario. Makes such procedures applicable to other boards established by the Commission.

titles.title: To establish certain procedures regarding the appointment and tenure of persons to the International St. Lawrence River Board of Control established by the International Joint Commission under the Boundary Waters Treaty of 1909.
